text: We chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios ri kepatanijik pa ri Tyoxalaj kꞌolibꞌal xaq esal uwach ri kape na, jacha ri xubꞌij loq ri Moisés are jubꞌiqꞌ karaj kuyak ri qꞌijilaꞌbꞌal Dios ri utz kukꞌaꞌx kumal achyabꞌ, ri Dios xubꞌij che ri Moisés: Qas naꞌtaj chawe je kabꞌan che jetaq ri xinkꞌut chawach puꞌwiꞌ le juyubꞌ.8:5b Ri nimalaj juyubꞌ riꞌ are ri kabꞌix “juyubꞌ Sinaí” che.
